resources.string: Tap the screen to start search for checkerboard.\nTap the screen again to stop
Tap either a pawn or an empty cell to change the status of this one
Mind the indicators you\'ll see on the screen.In order to receive a consistent hint, position yourself so that indicators are satisfied
It\'s essential that checkerboard has a clear line which encloses its squares as in the example above.
Make sure that the lightning condition is \"good\".Lightning condition is \"good\" if you can perfectly distinguish pawns shapes and color by covering an eye of yours.
